title: Drawing, September 12, 1854
medium: Graphite and white chalk on brown wove paper.
inscribed: Inscribed and dated in graphite, bottom left margin: Chicorua [sic] - from hill to right of / Albany road. -  Sepr -  12:  54. ;and again below: drive & pic nic  with Hoyt.
description: Horizontal view with trees and rocks in foreground leading to a meadow containing a lake, which spreads out before a mountain range in the middle ground, as Mount Chocorua, the highest peak, rises just left of center in the background.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, September 12, 1854.
September 12, 1854. Graphite and white chalk on brown wove paper.. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1942-50-222.
